item.description:
Hello Canadians,

Well it's almost December and that must mean one thing... time for our Annual Christmas party. This year we will be hosting the party at the White Horse Tavern in Brighton. They have promised us complimentary pool and great food and drink specials. This year the Kiwi's, Aussies and Brits will be joining to make it a Commonwealth party! Hope you can make it.

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the Pool Tables

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: 7th Annual Commonwealth Expat Holiday Party
